titleStmt.title: The redemption of mankind, by the passion of our Lord A sermon, preached on Palm-Sunday, at Kintbury, in the county of Berks. By Jos. Perkins, late vicar of Hill, in Gloucester-Shire.
titleStmt.author: Perkins, Joseph, b. 1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed, and are to be sold by Randall Taylor, near Stationers-Hall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
